text: Shirish Hiralal Chaudhari is an Indian politician popularly known as shirishdada ,who is a member of the 15th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He is an independent candidate, winning by a margin of 21,239 against the Modi wave. Chaudhari represents the Amalner Assembly Constituency. He was the first MLA to establish free gymnasium centers in Amalner district. ==References== Category:Members of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:People from Jalgaon district Category:Independent politicians in India Category:Living people Category:Marathi politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Shirish Hiralal Chaudhari
